entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 11:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: W 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning early in the afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow or rain. High plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of snow or rain. High plus 3. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
